title: upgrade files from 4.5 give errors
body:
i've upgrade my pg owncloud to 5.0(git from today)
the upgrade seems to went well ... but when the interface reload the fs upgrade starts...without stopping ...

in apache.log i got : 
```
mon mar 04 22:01:03 2013] [error] [client 127.0.0.1] php fatal error:  uncaught exception 'pdoexception' with message 'sqlstate[23505]:
 unique violation: 7 error:  duplicate key value violates unique constraint "oc_filecache_pkey"' in /var/www/pgoc/core/lib/db.php:963
stack trace:
#0 /var/www/pgoc/core/lib/db.php(963): pdostatement->execute(array)
#1 /var/www/pgoc/core/lib/files/cache/upgrade.php(74): pdostatementwrapper->execute(array)
#2 /var/www/pgoc/core/lib/files/cache/upgrade.php(56): oc\\files\\cache\\upgrade->insert(array)
#3 /var/www/pgoc/core/lib/files/cache/upgrade.php(58): oc\\files\\cache\\upgrade->upgradechilds(2)
#4 /var/www/pgoc/core/lib/files/cache/upgrade.php(44): oc\\files\\cache\\upgrade->upgradechilds(1, true)
#5 /var/www/pgoc/core/apps/files/ajax/upgrade.php(17): oc\\files\\cache\\upgrade->upgradepath('/admin/files')
#6 /var/www/pgoc/core/lib/base.php(668): require_once('/var/www/pgoc/c...')
#7 [internal function]: oc::loadappscriptfile(array)
#8 /var/www/pgoc/core/lib/router.php(127): call_user_func(array, array)
#9 /var/www/pgoc/core/lib/base.php(602): oc_router->mat in /var/www/pgoc/core/lib/db.php on line 963, referer: http://pgoc/core/index.php/apps/files

```
